com.neatnodes.genome

Class Connection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.neatnodes.genome.Connection

  • public class Connection
extends java.lang.Object
    A directional link between two nodes. One of the basic elements used to construct Genomes. When it is fired, it takes the value being output by it's in-node , applies a weight to it, and sets it as an input to it's out-node.
    Author:
    Sam Griffin

    • Constructor Detail

      • Connection

        Connection(Node inNode,
           Node outNode,
           double weight,
           boolean enabled,
           int innovationNumber)
        Creates a Connection.
        Parameters:
        inNode - The Node that the Connection runs from.
        outNode - The Node that the Connection runs to.
        weight - The weight that will be applied to data flowing through the Connection
        enabled - Whether the Connection is active or disabled.
        innovationNumber - The innovation number used to mark the ancestry of the Connection.

    • Method Detail

      • getWeight

        public double getWeight()
        Get the Connection's weight.
        Returns:
        The weight of the Connection.

      • setWeight

        public void setWeight(double weight)
        Set the Connection's weight.
        Parameters:
        weight - The weight to set.

      • isEnabled

        public boolean isEnabled()
        Check whether the Connection is enabled.
        Returns:
        True if the Connection is enabled.

      • setEnabled

        void setEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Set whether the Connection is enabled.
        Parameters:
        enabled - True to enable the Connection, false to disable it.

      • getInNode

        public Node getInNode()
        Get the Node that the Connection starts at.
        Returns:
        The Node.

      • getOutNode

        public Node getOutNode()
        Get the Node that the Connection ends at.
        Returns:
        The Node.

      • getInnovationNumber

        public int getInnovationNumber()
        Get the Connection's innovation number.
        Returns:
        The innovation number.

      • transfer

        void transfer()
        Move the output from the in Node to the input of the out Node, applying the current weight. This method will do nothing if the Connection is not enabled.
